text: I've added a simple menu to a custom module. In the page editor this is what I see. I can't reach the delete button++. Any way to implement a menu which can be edited in the page editor?

Hey dear community

I’ve created a website with HubSpot CMS integrated to Shopify to create paid subscription funnel to an mobile app.
My client have its own internal app on its server.

*NEED : Each time a customer execute a payment I want to send DEAL data to this external app.*

- I’ve tried with webhook in workflow but by this way I send CONTACT data and not DEAL data.
- So I suppose I have to create an app and use API WEBHOOK to send DEAL data but I have never do this.

Thanks a lot for your help !

Anyone ? (modifié)

Hi Loic, you can create an app and subscribe events like "new deal". You can use that trigger to get some data (not so many) but you can also use that trigger to take the deal id and ask the deal API for that deal.
